Container.Name: JMusicBot
Container.Overview: A cross-platform Discord music bot with a clean interface! To get started, run the container once and then stop it. Modify the config.txt file to add your Discord ID and Discord Bot Token. Once that's done, simply restart the container and let it run. It couldn't be easier! :D

Config.Name: Config folder
Config.Description: The location in which the config.txt file is stored.
